name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Experiment
summary: An EV3E file is an experiment by LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3, an application that enables you to build and program LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 robots. It contains information about an experiment users load onto an EV3 Brick to test LEGO robots, such as configuration settings (e.g., experiment duration, data-loggin intervals from sensors, and the sensors to collect data from). EV3E files are included in .EV3E projects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
